meanings.definition: A metric unit of mass equal to one thousandth of a kilogram.
meanings.sent1: She measured the flour in grams for the recipe.
meanings.sent2: The scale showed her weight in grams.
meanings.sent3: The baker accidentally added an extra gramme of sugar to the cake batter.
meanings.sent4: His love for her weighed more than a million grammes of gold.
meanings.sent5: The gramme of salt in the soup made all the difference in taste.

meanings.definition: A unit of weight in the metric system, equal to 15.432 grains or 0.035 ounce.
meanings.sent1: The jewelry was so delicate, each piece weighed only a gramme.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store sells fruits by the gramme.
meanings.sent3: The cat played with a gramme of catnip, thinking it was a mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her words carried the weight of a thousand grammes of wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The gramme of sand slipped through his fingers, lost in time.
